segments.text: I observe the woman focused on her dish towel and plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's completely unaware of the water cascading over the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me feel bad for her, she'll be upset later.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is spreading across the floor towards her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, turning to the children, the boy is on a stool reaching high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is right there, full and tempting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching so far, it looks dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him has her arm up, eyes wide with expectation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're like little thieves in their own home.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but smile at their excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the unstable stool worries me a lot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is serene, bushes neatly trimmed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This contrast between calm outside and frenzy inside is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Hopefully, no one gets hurt in this moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
